TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityProtocol extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The SecurityProtocol enumeration is used to specify the security protocol used by a connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Pct1Client = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the client is using the PCT1 protocol. The value is equal to 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Pct1Server = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the server is using the PCT1 protocol. The value is equal to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Ssl2Client = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the client is using the SSL2 protocol. The value is equal to 8.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Ssl2Server = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the server is using the SSL2 protocol. The value is equal to 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Ssl3Client = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the client is using the SSL3 protocol. The value is equal to 32.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Ssl3Server = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the server is using the SSL3 protocol. The value is equal to 16.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Tls1Client = int32(128)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the client is using the TLS1 protocol. The value is equal to 128.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityProtocol Tls1Server = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the server is using the TLS1 protocol. The value is equal to 64.
